ruleSearch.name: div.item>dl>dt>a@text
ruleSearch.author: div.item>dl>div.btm>a@text
ruleSearch.lastChapter: {{@@div.item>dl>div.btm>em:last-of-type@text}}{{", 【该源搜索页不展示最新章节】"}}

ruleExplore.name: #newscontent>div.l>ul>li>span:nth-of-type(2)>a@text
ruleExplore.author: #newscontent>div.l>ul>li>span:nth-of-type(4)@text
ruleExplore.coverUrl:
<js>
let bookUrl = result.select("a:first-of-type").attr("href");
let bookId = bookUrl.match(/_(\d+)\//)[1];
let imageBaseUrl = "http://img.xgbqiuge.com/";
let imageDetailUrl = `${parseInt(bookId / 1000)}/${bookId}/${bookId}s.jpg`;
imageBaseUrl + imageDetailUrl;
</js>

bookSourceComment:
目标书籍更新快；
偶尔会段落乱序，但后续会修复；
网站经常抽风；
搜索书籍功能很慢；
发现页无书籍封面和书籍简介；
header: {"User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/126.0.0.0 Safari/537.36"}

[
